title: No Poro King und Co. on Alpha  Client
body:
I can´t play all this Gamemodes like Poro King {{summoner:31}} , Nexus Siege {{item:3631}}  etc. on Alpha Client.
They aren´t even listed.

I really miss this gamemodes
Do you work on it?

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Hey! This is coming with the 6.24 patch very soon.

> [{quoted}](name=cCc Grumbles cCc,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=OcjuPIVT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-05T23:47:00.622+0000)
>
> Hey! This is coming with the 6.24 patch very soon.

I saw it.
Thank you for working on this Client.
You are the best!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
